themes: need for baseline funding for small and midsize groups
targeted larger grants to help organizations grow
venue cost burden on small organizations
funding being diverted to venue expenses instead of artists
key_phrases: find a baseline for small to midsize groups
offer target grants of larger sizes for these same groups to level up
subsidize venues so rent is cheaper
smaller organizations with funding give most of it to venues to perform instead of paying artists
barriers_identified: high venue costs for small organizations
funding primarily spent on venue rental instead of artists
solutions_proposed: establish baseline funding for small and midsize groups
offer larger targeted grants to help groups grow
increase venue subsidies to reduce rent costs
